description: Help Lily use her imagination to unlock her memories and relive the events of a night that changed her life. Discover what happened and what is 103.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5 7600 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GT 1030 2GB / RX 560 4GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i7 7700K or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 3GB / RX 580 8GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
